name: Life Fighters
description: WASD to move right click to fire B to buy menu Tab to position menu Ecs for pause menu. your enemy will try to chase you down and kill you by colliding. but you can buy upgrades. and every time a wave completes the health that u have remained will be changed into money and will generate your health back. this is a wave based game and also very hard. I myself don't ever had completed the game. This game was made for Quad Game JAM 2. hopefully i will win some position.
